publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4351 Jackie Baillie: All Rise for Dumbarton Sheriff Court—That the Parliament welcomes the reopening of Dumbarton Sheriff Court by the Rt Hon Lord Hamilton, Lord President of the Court of Session, on Friday 5 June 2009; understands that £12 million was invested in the refurbishment of Dumbarton Sheriff Court; notes that the upgraded court complex will provide five modern courtrooms as well as vastly improved facilities for witnesses, juries, staff, sheriffs and court visitors; recognises that the refurbishment has preserved the original architectural identity of the B–listed building and also improved its energy efficiency, with high levels of insulation and motion-activated lighting among the many new features, and congratulates all those involved in the successful reopening of the court, which has contributed towards the regeneration of Dumbarton town centre.
S3M-4351 All Rise for Dumbarton Sheriff Court (lodged on 10 June 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4351 Jackie Baillie: All Rise for Dumbarton Sheriff Court—That the Parliament welcomes the reopening of Dumbarton Sheriff Court by the Rt Hon Lord Hamilton, Lord President of the Court of Session, on Friday 5 June 2009; understands that £12 million was invested in the refurbishment of Dumbarton Sheriff Court; notes that the upgraded court complex will provide five modern courtrooms as well as vastly improved facilities for witnesses, juries, staff, sheriffs and court visitors; recognises that the refurbishment has preserved the original architectural identity of the B–listed building and also improved its energy efficiency, with high levels of insulation and motion-activated lighting among the many new features, and congratulates all those involved in the successful reopening of the court, which has contributed towards the regeneration of Dumbarton town centre. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn

S3M-4351 All Rise for Dumbarton Sheriff Court (lodged on 10 June 2009) Patricia Ferguson*, Karen Whitefield*, Ian McKee*, Kenneth Gibson*, Des McNulty*, Helen Eadie*, Gil Paterson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-4351 All Rise for Dumbarton Sheriff Court (lodged on 10 June 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-4351 All Rise for Dumbarton Sheriff Court (lodged on 10 June 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-4351 All Rise for Dumbarton Sheriff Court (lodged on 10 June 2009) Stuart McMillan*
